title: Get Started
description: We built Numeral to be the easiest way for ecommerce entrepreneurs to handle sales tax.
seoDescription: We built Numeral to be the easiest way for ecommerce entrepreneurs to handle sales tax.

data.html:
What’s your type of business?

What’s your projected revenue for 2025?

Which countries are you selling in?

Other countries
Continue

We had many issues with TaxJar, including incorrect tax filings that resulted in an overpayment of $5,700 and non-existent customer support. Numeral provided complete onboarding, prompt customer service, and rapid feature additions based on customer input.

Kevin Chanthasiriphan
,
Founder, immi

I was spending way too many hours every month on sales tax. Numeral has made it easy to identify and know the tax laws. And then, on your behalf, registering and managing everything takes the worry off my plate.

Jesse Hiss
,
Founder, Fresh Sends

It's set it and forget it. At the end of the day, I'd much rather spend time growing our business than worrying about sales tax. We love Numeral. I don't know how you squeeze a number out of it, but I'd give working with them a 10 out of 10.

Adrian Zhang
,
Co-founder, The Woobles

As a founder, sales tax for my SaaS business was the last thing I wanted to think about. Numeral made it dead simple for Archive to stay compliant across multiple jurisdictions. Plus, their developer experience is thoughtful and built with craft.

Paul Benigeri
,
CEO, Archive

Numeral tailors its solution to each client’s needs. Everything is customized. And I loved that I could talk to sales tax experts. Numeral guarantees no compliance mistakes will happen. Nobody else was willing to make that promise.

Jason Wong
,
Founder, Doe Lashes

Sales tax compliance is a consistent frustration for my Series A & B SaaS clients. As a busy CFO, I want to spend my energy on strategic work, not compliance. With Numeral, I can delegate away the minutia of state tax compliance.

Hari Seshadri
,
CEO, Fractional

<script>

// getCookie function
function getCookie(name) {
  let matches = document.cookie.match(new RegExp(
    "(?:^|; )" + name.replace(/([\.$?*|{}\(\)\[\]\\\/\+^])/g, '\\$1') + "=([^;]*)"
  ));
  return matches ? decodeURIComponent(matches[1]) : undefined;
}


const demoFlows = document.querySelector('.v3_demo-flows');
const demoFlowsWrappers = document.querySelectorAll('.v3_demo-flow-wrapper');
demoFlowsWrappers.forEach((demoFlowsWrapper) => {
	if(getCookie('enteringPage') == 'global') {
   demoFlowsWrapper.classList.add('global');
  }
});


const demoFlowsWrapper = document.querySelector('.v3_demo-flow-wrapper');



// PROGRESS BAR
const demoFlowProgressDivs = document.querySelectorAll(".v3_demo-flow-progress");
const demoFlowProgressDot2 = document.querySelector(".v3_demo-flow-progress-dot:nth-child(2)");
const demoFlowProgressDot3 = document.querySelector(".v3_demo-flow-progress-dot:nth-child(3)");
const demoFlowProgressDot4 = document.querySelector(".v3_demo-flow-progress-dot:nth-child(4)");
const demoFlowProgressDot5 = document.querySelector(".v3_demo-flow-progress-dot:nth-child(5)");


// >> DEMO FLOW 1
const demoFlow1 = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-1');
const demoFlow1Form = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-1-form');
const demoFlow1FormEmailField = demoFlow1Form.querySelector('input[type="email"]');
const demoFlow1FormSubmitButton = demoFlow1Form.querySelector('input[type="submit"]');
demoFlow1FormSubmitButton.style.display = 'none';


// If contact_email cookie is set, set email field value using its value:
if(getCookie('contact_email')) {
  //console.log("set flow 1");
  demoFlow1FormEmailField.value = getCookie('contact_email');
}

const demoFlow1FormRadioButtons = demoFlow1Form.querySelectorAll('input[type="radio"]');
demoFlow1FormRadioButtons.forEach((demoFlow1FormRadioButton) => {
  demoFlow1FormRadioButton.addEventListener('change', function(e){
  	document.cookie = "typeOfBusiness=" + demoFlow1FormRadioButton.value;
  	demoFlow1.style.display = 'none';
		demoFlowProgressDivs.forEach((item) => {
			item.classList.add('step-2');
    });
    demoFlow2.style.display = 'flex';
    //demoFlow1Form.submit();
  });
});
// << DEMO FLOW 1


// >> DEMO FLOW 2
const demoFlow2 = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-2');
const demoFlow2Form = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-2-form');
const demoFlow2FormEmailField = demoFlow2Form.querySelector('input[type="email"]');
const demoFlow2FormSubmitButton = demoFlow2Form.querySelector('input[type="submit"]');
demoFlow2FormSubmitButton.style.display = 'none';


// If contact_email cookie is set, set email field value using its value:
if(getCookie('contact_email')) {
  //console.log("set flow 2");
  demoFlow2FormEmailField.value = getCookie('contact_email');
}

const demoFlow2FormRadioButtons = demoFlow2Form.querySelectorAll('input[type="radio"]');
demoFlow2FormRadioButtons.forEach((demoFlow2FormRadioButton) => {
  demoFlow2FormRadioButton.addEventListener('change', function(e){
  	document.cookie = "annualStoreRevenue=" + demoFlow2FormRadioButton.value;
    
    if(getCookie('typeOfBusiness')) {
      $('select[name="type_of_business"]').val(getCookie('typeOfBusiness')).change();
      $('select[name="type_of_business"]').closest('fieldset').hide();
    }

    if(getCookie('annualStoreRevenue')) {
      $('select[name="annual_store_revenue"]').val(getCookie('annualStoreRevenue')).change();
      $('select[name="annual_store_revenue"]').closest('fieldset').hide();
      //$('select[name="annual_store_revenue"]').attr("required", false);
    } 
    
    if(getCookie('contact_email')) {
			$('input[name="email"]').val(getCookie('contact_email')).change();
      $('input[name="email"]').prop('readonly', true);
			//$('input[name="email"]').closest('fieldset').hide();
      //todo: hide fieldset
    };
    
  	demoFlow2.style.display = 'none';
		demoFlowProgressDivs.forEach((item) => {
			item.classList.add('step-3');
    });
    if(demoFlowsWrapper.classList.contains('global')) {
    	demoFlow3.style.display = 'flex';
    } else {
    	demoFlows.style.display = 'none';
    	document.querySelector('.v3_demo-hero.demo-flow-hero').style.display = 'block';
    }
    //demoFlow2Form.submit();
  });
});
// << DEMO FLOW 2


// >> DEMO FLOW 3
const demoFlow3 = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-3');
const demoFlow3Form = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-3-form');
const demoFlow3FormEmailField = demoFlow3Form.querySelector('input[type="email"]');
const demoFlow3FormSubmitButton = demoFlow3Form.querySelector('input[type="submit"]');
demoFlow3FormSubmitButton.style.display = 'none';

//const demoFlow3BackButton = document.querySelector('.v3_demo-flow-form_buttons .v3_button.outline');
const demoFlow3ContinueButton = document.querySelector('.v3_demo-flow-form_buttons .v3_button.brand');



// If contact_email cookie is set, set email field value using its value:
if(getCookie('contact_email')) {
  //console.log("set flow 1");
  demoFlow3FormEmailField.value = getCookie('contact_email');
}


const demoFlow3FormCheckboxes = demoFlow3Form.querySelectorAll('input[type="checkbox"]');

demoFlow3FormCheckboxes.forEach((demoFlow3FormCheckbox) => {
  demoFlow3FormCheckbox.addEventListener('change', function(e){
  	//demoFlow3.style.display = 'none';
		demoFlowProgressDivs.forEach((item) => {
			item.classList.add('step-4');
    });
  });
});
	
  demoFlow3ContinueButton.addEventListener('click', function(){
  	// Get checked countries
  	const countryCheckboxes = document.querySelectorAll('#v3_demo-flow-3-form input[type="checkbox"]:not([value="Other"]):checked');
    // If at least 1 country is selected hide Demo Flow 3 and show Demo Hero :
		if(countryCheckboxes.length > 0) {
      demoFlow3.style.display = 'none';
      demoFlows.style.display = 'none';
      demoFlowProgressDivs.forEach((item) => {
        item.classList.add('step-4');
      });
      document.querySelector('.v3_demo-hero.demo-flow-hero').style.display = 'block';
      //demoFlow3Form.submit();
      // update country in form
      const selectedCountries = getCookie('selectedCountries').split(",");
    	selectedCountries.forEach((selectedCountry) => {
      demoFormCountries.forEach((demoFormCountry) => {
        if(demoFormCountry.value == selectedCountry) {
          $("#"+demoFormCountry.id).prop('checked', true).change();
        }
      });
    });

    }
  });

// << DEMO FLOW 3


</script>

content.html:
<script>

// getCookie function
function getCookie(name) {
  let matches = document.cookie.match(new RegExp(
    "(?:^|; )" + name.replace(/([\.$?*|{}\(\)\[\]\\\/\+^])/g, '\\$1') + "=([^;]*)"
  ));
  return matches ? decodeURIComponent(matches[1]) : undefined;
}


const demoFlows = document.querySelector('.v3_demo-flows');
const demoFlowsWrappers = document.querySelectorAll('.v3_demo-flow-wrapper');
demoFlowsWrappers.forEach((demoFlowsWrapper) => {
	if(getCookie('enteringPage') == 'global') {
   demoFlowsWrapper.classList.add('global');
  }
});


const demoFlowsWrapper = document.querySelector('.v3_demo-flow-wrapper');



// PROGRESS BAR
const demoFlowProgressDivs = document.querySelectorAll(".v3_demo-flow-progress");
const demoFlowProgressDot2 = document.querySelector(".v3_demo-flow-progress-dot:nth-child(2)");
const demoFlowProgressDot3 = document.querySelector(".v3_demo-flow-progress-dot:nth-child(3)");
const demoFlowProgressDot4 = document.querySelector(".v3_demo-flow-progress-dot:nth-child(4)");
const demoFlowProgressDot5 = document.querySelector(".v3_demo-flow-progress-dot:nth-child(5)");


// >> DEMO FLOW 1
const demoFlow1 = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-1');
const demoFlow1Form = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-1-form');
const demoFlow1FormEmailField = demoFlow1Form.querySelector('input[type="email"]');
const demoFlow1FormSubmitButton = demoFlow1Form.querySelector('input[type="submit"]');
demoFlow1FormSubmitButton.style.display = 'none';


// If contact_email cookie is set, set email field value using its value:
if(getCookie('contact_email')) {
  //console.log("set flow 1");
  demoFlow1FormEmailField.value = getCookie('contact_email');
}

const demoFlow1FormRadioButtons = demoFlow1Form.querySelectorAll('input[type="radio"]');
demoFlow1FormRadioButtons.forEach((demoFlow1FormRadioButton) => {
  demoFlow1FormRadioButton.addEventListener('change', function(e){
  	document.cookie = "typeOfBusiness=" + demoFlow1FormRadioButton.value;
  	demoFlow1.style.display = 'none';
		demoFlowProgressDivs.forEach((item) => {
			item.classList.add('step-2');
    });
    demoFlow2.style.display = 'flex';
    //demoFlow1Form.submit();
  });
});
// << DEMO FLOW 1


// >> DEMO FLOW 2
const demoFlow2 = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-2');
const demoFlow2Form = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-2-form');
const demoFlow2FormEmailField = demoFlow2Form.querySelector('input[type="email"]');
const demoFlow2FormSubmitButton = demoFlow2Form.querySelector('input[type="submit"]');
demoFlow2FormSubmitButton.style.display = 'none';


// If contact_email cookie is set, set email field value using its value:
if(getCookie('contact_email')) {
  //console.log("set flow 2");
  demoFlow2FormEmailField.value = getCookie('contact_email');
}

const demoFlow2FormRadioButtons = demoFlow2Form.querySelectorAll('input[type="radio"]');
demoFlow2FormRadioButtons.forEach((demoFlow2FormRadioButton) => {
  demoFlow2FormRadioButton.addEventListener('change', function(e){
  	document.cookie = "annualStoreRevenue=" + demoFlow2FormRadioButton.value;
    
    if(getCookie('typeOfBusiness')) {
      $('select[name="type_of_business"]').val(getCookie('typeOfBusiness')).change();
      $('select[name="type_of_business"]').closest('fieldset').hide();
    }

    if(getCookie('annualStoreRevenue')) {
      $('select[name="annual_store_revenue"]').val(getCookie('annualStoreRevenue')).change();
      $('select[name="annual_store_revenue"]').closest('fieldset').hide();
      //$('select[name="annual_store_revenue"]').attr("required", false);
    } 
    
    if(getCookie('contact_email')) {
			$('input[name="email"]').val(getCookie('contact_email')).change();
      $('input[name="email"]').prop('readonly', true);
			//$('input[name="email"]').closest('fieldset').hide();
      //todo: hide fieldset
    };
    
  	demoFlow2.style.display = 'none';
		demoFlowProgressDivs.forEach((item) => {
			item.classList.add('step-3');
    });
    if(demoFlowsWrapper.classList.contains('global')) {
    	demoFlow3.style.display = 'flex';
    } else {
    	demoFlows.style.display = 'none';
    	document.querySelector('.v3_demo-hero.demo-flow-hero').style.display = 'block';
    }
    //demoFlow2Form.submit();
  });
});
// << DEMO FLOW 2


// >> DEMO FLOW 3
const demoFlow3 = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-3');
const demoFlow3Form = document.querySelector('#v3_demo-flow-3-form');
const demoFlow3FormEmailField = demoFlow3Form.querySelector('input[type="email"]');
const demoFlow3FormSubmitButton = demoFlow3Form.querySelector('input[type="submit"]');
demoFlow3FormSubmitButton.style.display = 'none';

//const demoFlow3BackButton = document.querySelector('.v3_demo-flow-form_buttons .v3_button.outline');
const demoFlow3ContinueButton = document.querySelector('.v3_demo-flow-form_buttons .v3_button.brand');



// If contact_email cookie is set, set email field value using its value:
if(getCookie('contact_email')) {
  //console.log("set flow 1");
  demoFlow3FormEmailField.value = getCookie('contact_email');
}


const demoFlow3FormCheckboxes = demoFlow3Form.querySelectorAll('input[type="checkbox"]');

demoFlow3FormCheckboxes.forEach((demoFlow3FormCheckbox) => {
  demoFlow3FormCheckbox.addEventListener('change', function(e){
  	//demoFlow3.style.display = 'none';
		demoFlowProgressDivs.forEach((item) => {
			item.classList.add('step-4');
    });
  });
});
	
  demoFlow3ContinueButton.addEventListener('click', function(){
  	// Get checked countries
  	const countryCheckboxes = document.querySelectorAll('#v3_demo-flow-3-form input[type="checkbox"]:not([value="Other"]):checked');
    // If at least 1 country is selected hide Demo Flow 3 and show Demo Hero :
		if(countryCheckboxes.length > 0) {
      demoFlow3.style.display = 'none';
      demoFlows.style.display = 'none';
      demoFlowProgressDivs.forEach((item) => {
        item.classList.add('step-4');
      });
      document.querySelector('.v3_demo-hero.demo-flow-hero').style.display = 'block';
      //demoFlow3Form.submit();
      // update country in form
      const selectedCountries = getCookie('selectedCountries').split(",");
    	selectedCountries.forEach((selectedCountry) => {
      demoFormCountries.forEach((demoFormCountry) => {
        if(demoFormCountry.value == selectedCountry) {
          $("#"+demoFormCountry.id).prop('checked', true).change();
        }
      });
    });

    }
  });

// << DEMO FLOW 3


</script>
